capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: The role requires strong written and verbal communication skills to develop operational policy, provide technical guidance, and engage stakeholders.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Supporting a team and engaging stakeholders to influence the direction of threatened species conservation necessitates collaboration.

capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Assisting in the development and coordination of conservation programs to achieve specific outcomes for threatened species and ecosystems.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: The role involves planning and prioritizing tasks to support the strategic direction of conservation projects.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Requires problem-solving skills to develop practical solutions for conservation challenges.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Experience in supporting project delivery is essential, indicating a need for project management skills.

capabilities.name: Technology
capabilities.description: Experience in data management with Excel is required, showing the need for technological proficiency.

capabilities.name: Value Diversity
capabilities.description: The commitment to a diverse and inclusive workplace indicates the importance of valuing diversity.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Engaging with stakeholders to support conservation efforts and policy development.

skills.name: Conservation Strategies
skills.description: Developing and implementing strategies for the conservation of threatened species and ecosystems.

skills.name: Policy Development
skills.description: Assisting in the development of operational policy for conservation programs.

skills.name: Data Management
skills.description: Managing and analyzing data related to conservation programs, using tools like Excel.

generalRole.title: Conservation Project Officer
generalRole.description: This role focuses on supporting the development and delivery of conservation projects, particularly for threatened species, through policy development, stakeholder engagement, and technical support. It requires a blend of environmental science knowledge, project management, and communication skills.
